text:
@SpeakerPelosi @WHO I oppose Trump’s reckless withdrawal from the #WorldHealthOrganization We need a global response to the #Coronavirus not U.S. isolation.  Trump’s  decision makes us less safe.
Is US becoming a monarchy or just going #Rogue ?
